subsection_content:
Anyone can get pterygium, but age, gender and geographic location characteristics can increase the risk:
People between 20 and 40 years old are more likely to have dreamy eyes.; Men are 2 times more likely to have pterygium than women; People living near the equator are at higher risk due to exposure to stronger ultraviolet light.
subsection_title: mong mat.json. Subjects susceptible to pterygium (pterygia)
subsection_data:
mong mat.json. Subjects susceptible to pterygium (pterygia)
Anyone can get pterygium, but age, gender and geographic location characteristics can increase the risk:
People between 20 and 40 years old are more likely to have dreamy eyes.; Men are 2 times more likely to have pterygium than women; People living near the equator are at higher risk due to exposure to stronger ultraviolet light.
